replies.body: hope we had access to ur PC.... :P

Hi there, I'd like to help with this but your screenshots cannot be attached through the boards.  You can instead upload it on an image sight like [Imgur](http://imgur.com/), and post the link here.   What is the issue that you're having, or what are you seeing?
